text.text_translated:
We often see small animals in cities and towns.
For example, we see birds, squirrels, mice, and insects.
But now, things are changing.
More big, wild animals are coming to cities.
There are many news reports about this.
People saw bears in parks in Vancouver.
They saw leopards on the streets in Mumbai.
They also saw wild pigs in gardens in Berlin.
So, what happens when these animals come to our cities?
Are people happy to see them?
Or are they a danger or a problem?
